channel.title: Ridiculousness
channel.description:
Is there a penalty for being this ridiculous?
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2uidauf.png[/img]

item.title: Ridiculousness
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:13, topic:383016”][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=478799.msg3505705#msg3505705 date=1298143874]

Reputation means nothing. Travis, nor any other member cares (or at least shouldn’t care) about reputation. Therefore, I doubt anything will be done about it.

inb4lock/delete

Why do you call him Travis? I’ve know him for 4 years, I’ve been a staff member for 2 years, yet I still call him moparisthebest, just like every other staff member does…

I call vain “Thomas” and Krackkid “Chris”. It’s just a way people do things. He’s not doing it as a sign of “I know him better”.
[/quote]

Do you speak to both of those kids on a day to day basis though? That would constitute calling somebody by their first name then. I however have know many people over the internet for years on end and unless their display name happens to be their actual name (me, david, casey, etc.) then I wouldn’t ever think of calling somebody by a different name. For instance never in a million years would I call Taharok Ben. I messaged him the other day on Facebook and I still called him Taharok…[/quote]
Stop getting off topic noob. <3 You have, however, called me Jason a bunch of times.

@topic: There are so many people that are obsessed with reputation… I rep-- them for something for something I see as rep-- material (most of the time), and they must rep-- me back because they get mad.

Read full topic

item.title: Ridiculousness
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Unlike MITB, there is no penally for being a dumbass on here.

Read full topic

item.title: Ridiculousness
item.dc:creator: @riku9182 riku9182
item.description:
@riku9182 wrote:

[quote=“TOMSCAPE BETA, post:7, topic:383016”]Riku9182 is a general idiot, just ignore him.

He rep–'d me for not giving him 15 dollars a few weeks back. Though rep is just a number, his reasons reflect his immaturity and need to vent his anger on members of the community.[/quote]
Lol’d
Umadbro?
That’s complete BS

Read full topic

item.title: Ridiculousness
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

Davidi2:

If you care to see how pointless reputation is, take a look at the rep of everyone in this thread.

I wouldn’t mind having 10 Rep because its what you do for the community that shows how respected you are, not what a little number says. I just get mad at the fact that someone can just get mad and for no reason can take there rage out on us threw doing this and there is no punishment at all. I could rep-- a new person for a week for no reason and no one would care. (Just an example, im not mean like that)

Read full topic
